item.title: 1. Infrastructure
item.description: Executive summary The dashboards project is a project at FHI concerned with running automated analyses on data. In principle, the dashboards project is split up into two parts: The umbrella infrastructure (i.e. Docker containers, continuous integration, chron jobs, etc.) The R package for each automated analysis What is an automated analysis? An automated analysis is any analysis that: Will be repeated multiple times in the future Always has an input dataset with consistent file structure Always has the same expected output (e.
